short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minner Memer allows you to easily insert memes into your X Posts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension, "Minner Memer," enhances your social media experience by allowing you to easily insert memes into your posts on X (formerly known as Twitter). 

The extension provides a seamless way to fetch and display memes from different NFT collections and meme coins directly within the tweet reply interface.

Users can select their preferred meme collection, which is saved for future use, and copy memes to their clipboard with a single click.

Currently supported collections:
- Sh*tty Kitties (Algorand)
- $B*ALLS*CK (Algorand)

Key features include:
- Meme Insertion: Quickly insert memes into your X posts by selecting from a grid of available memes.
- Collection Management: Choose from multiple meme collections and set your preferred collection for easy access.
- Clipboard Copying: Copy memes directly to your clipboard for easy pasting into posts.
- Support the Developer: Includes a link to support the developer through donations.

Supercharge your social media presence with Minner Memer. Install it now and start sharing memes that drive engagement, conversation, and laughs!
